QuestionText: What is a common social trend in modern dating?
OptionA: Arranged marriages are becoming more popular
OptionB: Online dating is becoming more accepted
OptionC: Couples are getting married at a younger age
OptionD: Dating apps are only used for casual relationships
CorrectAnswer: Online dating is becoming more accepted

What is a growing trend in consumer behavior regarding sustainability?
OptionA: Consumers are prioritizing cheaper products over sustainable ones
OptionB: Consumers are increasingly preferring products with eco-friendly packaging
OptionC: Consumers are not concerned about sustainability
OptionD: Consumers are only buying products made locally
CorrectAnswer: Consumers are increasingly preferring products with eco-friendly packaging

QuestionText: How has social media influenced people's social interactions?
OptionC: It has had no impact on social interactions
OptionD: It has only affected older generations

QuestionText: What is observed as a trend in the way people work?
OptionA: More people are working from the office
OptionB: Remote work is becoming more common
OptionD: The 9-to-5 schedule is becoming more flexible for fewer people
CorrectAnswer: Remote work is becoming more common

QuestionText: What is a prevalent trend in leisure activities among younger generations?
OptionC: Streaming services are more popular than traditional TV
OptionD: Reading physical books is on the rise
CorrectAnswer: Streaming services are more popular than traditional TV

QuestionText: How are attitudes towards mental health changing?
OptionC: There is a growing openness to discussing mental health
OptionD: Only younger people are discussing mental health
CorrectAnswer: There is a growing openness to discussing mental health

QuestionText: What is a trend observed in travel preferences?
OptionA: People are preferring more crowded tourist destinations
OptionB: There is an increased interest in sustainable and eco-tourism
CorrectAnswer: There is an increased interest in sustainable and eco-tourism

QuestionText: What is happening to the traditional concept of retirement?
OptionC: The concept is evolving with more people working past traditional retirement age
CorrectAnswer: The concept is evolving with more people working past traditional retirement age

QuestionText: How is technology influencing social connections?
OptionC: It is facilitating global connections and communities
OptionD: It is only affecting younger generations
CorrectAnswer: It is facilitating global connections and communities
